name: Serpent Showdown
storyline:
It is time to don your... cardboard armor, and grab your trusty crayon?! Snakes can wear armor too!

Serpent Showdown is a competitive arena fighter for all ages and abilities. Play as two classroom pet snakes, battling it out to see who will reign victorious.

Strike, slither and slash your way to victory, while dodging paper wads thrown by your enemiesssss~
summary: Serpent Showdown is a competitive arena fighter for all ages! Play as two classroom pet snakes, battling it out to see who'll reign victorious. Strike, slither and slash your way to victory! Coming soon to PC and Nintendo Switch.
